name: Janet Fair & Natural Cream
description:
Fair and Natural cream that acts fast to give you lasting fairness. It works for UVA & UVB, acting like a triple sunscreen preventing skin darkening & contains Herbal Multi vitamins A, B, C & E to nourish, protect & control the formation of skin darkening pigments. *Images for illustration purpose only. Product received may vary.
Suitable for all Skin types. Ingredients are Rose, Marigold, Turmeric, Carrot, Wheatgerm, Lime, Arnica, Soya. Free from harmful effects of Bleach & Synthetic chemicals.
